snippet.description:
For Your Calendar..................................................2
by Robert Roddy Md, Book Review
"... 18 months ago I visited the city of Bruges in Belgium. Bruges is beautiful and has become a post ..."
Abstract \- Add to MetaCart
I would like to thank the members of ASAP for giving me the privilege to serve as its President for the coming year. I hope those of you who were able to attend the recent meeting in Philadelphia enjoyed yourselves and found the presentations interesting. The meeting focused on various aspects of adolescent violence. My thanks to all who gave of their time to contribute. Our organization owes a great vote of thanks to our immediate Past President, Mark Wellek. Mark has over the past year been a champion in the cause of the abolition of the death penalty

snippet.title: THE CAPITAL MARKET BEFORE 1600*
snippet.description:
THE CAPITAL MARKET BEFORE 1600*
by Meir Kohn, Jel Categories G , 1999
"... burghers of Bruges, Ghent, and Ypres (the drie steden) snapped up the issues of the smaller towns. 22 ..."
Abstract \- Cited by 1 (0 self) \- Add to MetaCart
ABSTRACT: This paper describes the evolution of long-term debt and equity finance in medieval and early modern Europe. The main issuers of long-term debt were landowners and municipalities. The paper discusses the evolution of debt secured by land and the use by municipal borrowers of annuities and ‘funded debt ’ (securitization). The paper then describes the various forms of equity finance and how they addressed the corporate governance problem.

snippet.title: unknown title
snippet.description:
unknown title
by unknown authors
"... will meet on the terrace of Hotel Villa Emilia (http://www.hotelvillaemilia.com/), Calle Calabria 115 ..."
Abstract \- Add to MetaCart
Inter 9 employs a creative drawing process based on what looks good to formulate entirely new ideas for enduring architectural issues. The unit encourages personal subjectivity and the ability of each student to defend the subjectivity of what looks good rather than the bogus objectivity of what is scientifically determined. Let’s not forget – architecture is an art, not a science. It questions the contemporary role of the drawing in architectural design and seeks to renew its vitality, and the project’s manufacture, via 3D printing techniques. The methods of mis-architecture include: mis-building, mis-shaping, mis-scaling, mis-reading, mis-constructing, mis-demeanours. Programme | Brief In 2009/10 Inter 9 will design the New Camp Nou in Barcelona. The club’s recent brief for the stadium redevelopment will be the guiding programmatic basis, but our own architectural and drawing processes will determine how you refashion the late-50s iron and concrete behemoth (designed by Francesc Mitjans-Miró, García Barbon and Soteras Mauri, 1957). Projects will be sited on the stadium’s current location, Avenida Arístides Maillol, will incorporate the existing field and stadium bowl, and will be geared to critiquing the typology’s perceived inflexibility.

snippet.title: Extensions of Linear Independent Component Analysis: Neural and Information-Theoretic Methods
snippet.description:
Extensions of Linear Independent Component Analysis: Neural and Information-Theoretic Methods
by Petteri Pajunen
"... sources. In Proc. European Symposium on Articial Neural Networks (ESANN'97), pages 255260, Bruges, Belgium ..."
Abstract \- Add to MetaCart
Obtaining information from measured data is a general problem which is encountered in numerous applications and fields of science. A goal of many data analysis methods is to transform the observed data into a representation which reveals the information contained in the data. Methods for obtaining such representations include principal component analysis, projection pursuit, cluster analysis, and neural unsupervised learning methods.
